Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-7039 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.71.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-7039 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.71.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glib is earlier than 2.71.0-6, affected by CVE-2025-7039
